availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: William Wilson Hollman (Eddyville, Kentucky, machinist and liquor dealer)

body.p: Eddyville, Kentucky, machinist and liquor dealer. Pennsylvania native. Married Zerelda Hollman. Father of George Hollman, Jane Hollman, and Charles Hollman. Machinist in Eddyville in 1860. Wholesale and retail liquor dealer in Lyon County, Kentucky, in 1864.

bibl.p: Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Lyon County, Eddyville, p. 102; Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Lyon County, District 1, p. 331; Ancestry.com. *U.S. IRS Tax Assessment Lists, 1862-1918( [database on-line]. Provo, UT, USA: Ancestry.com Operations Inc, 2008, Series M768, Roll 02, Lyon County, Kentucky, 1864, p. 49.
